DESCRIPTION: Set the verification settings for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setwhitelisted enable** ~ Enables the link/URL filter on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setwhitelisted disable** ~ Disables the link/URL filter on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setwhitelisted role [@Role]** ~ Sets a role to be whitelisted. This role will have the permission to post links anywhere in the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}setwhitelisted channel [#channel]** ~ Sets a channel to be whitelisted. This channel will allow links to be posted by anyone in the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_5: **{{prefix}}setwhitelisted user [@user]** ~ Sets a user to be whitelisted. This user will be able to post links anywhere in the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_6: **{{prefix}}setwhitelisted url [Your URL]** ~ Sets a url to be whitelisted. This url will be able to be posted by anyone. You only need to use the main domain of the url. For example, <https://gamer.netlify.com> will allow all links for this website.
USAGE: {{prefix}}setwhitelisted [enable | disable | channel | role | user | url] [#Channel | @Role | @User | URL]
ALIASES: Setwhitelisted does not have any aliases
ALREADY_ENABLED: The link/URL filter is already enabled.
ENABLED: The url filter has been enabled. I will make sure to filter out any URLs that I see.
ALREADY_DISABLED: The url filter is already disabled.
DISABLED: The url filter has been disabled. Let the URL Revolution begin! VIVA LA REVOLUTION!
NEED_ROLE: You did not provide any roles to be filtered.
ROLE_REMOVED: The role will no longer be whitelisted.
ROLE_ADDED: This role is now whitelisted, and now they can post links anywhere on the server.
NEED_CHANNEL: You did not provide any channels to be filtered.
CHANNEL_REMOVED: The channel is no longer whitelisted. URLs will no longer be allowed to be posted here.
CHANNEL_ADDED: The channel is now whitelisted. Anyone can post links on the channel.
NEED_USER: You did not provide any users to be whitelisted.
USER_REMOVED: The user has been removed from the whitelist. They will not be able to post links anymore.
USER_ADDED: The user has been added to the whitelist. They can now post links anywhere on the server.
NEED_URL: You did not provide any URL to add to the whitelist.
URL_REMOVED: The url you provided has been removed from the whitelist. No one will be able to post links from this URL anymore.
URL_ADDED: The url you provided has been added to the whitelist. Anyone on the server will be able to post links from this URL.
